message: Take it or leave it, Bob! You'll get $100000 now, and I'll get the rest. Don't make me wait!
You're not getting it all, Alice! Take this and let's move on!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! Let's split it 55/45 and be done with it!
You're getting a little too greedy, Alice. This is a fair offer. Take it or leave it!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob! 48/52 is a fair split, don't you think?
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you walk all over me. Take it or leave it!
